title: Is science better than technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sounds tricky but the truth is that technology is science. Because everything that you do must be with principles. As of the case that a programmer can just dream of a project and overnight the project comes to light, he must use the principles associated with the technology he wants to employ; the principles are learnt From Or as aspect of science. So we cannot separate science from technology to which I will say science gave birth to technology.
Science explores, which leads to many dead ends - technology builds on the successful outcomes offering up products and services for consumption by the public at large.
